features: EARRINGS FOR WOMEN SET- Come with 2 pairs different styles earrings a set. These thick gold hoop earrings are exquisite and lightweight, comfortable to wear, easy to wear all day without worry drag your earlobes.
HYPOALLERGENIC EARRINGS- Small hoop earrings with 925 sterling silver post or stainless steel post, nickel-free and lead-free hypoallergenic earrings for women's sensitive ears.

PERFECT GIFT- This earrings are all individually packaged and can be given as gifts to mothers, sisters, lovers, and friends at any time. This is an ideal choice for Christmas, Mother's Day, Valentine's Day, birthday, graduation, and anniversaries to give her a gift.
SUSTAINABILITY- Every piece of CARITATE jewelry is crafted with recycled materials. CARITATE has always maintained a carbon neutral stance, and committed to environmental friendliness.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED- Your satisfaction is our top priority. All CARITATE products have a hassle-free 180-day money-back guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Everyday Wear
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these earrings. They have backings, so you don't have to worry about it falling off your ears like the other kind does. These are light-weight and gorgeous to boot. I do have sensitive ears, so this is great for sensitive ears. I have worn them nonstop for 3 weeks and they have not irritated my ears. At all. I have long hair but you can still see them when I pull my hair back and they are just the right size. I am petite, so the oversized earrings that a lot of people like will not look good on me and these are just the right length.I would highly recommend these pairs of earrings. They go with everything in your wardrobe!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bigger than in picture, weird back, thicker than expected, but still very cute

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice set & can wear both designs together
reviews.reviewText: The Caritate gold hoops that I ordered are the more "basic style". One is a slightly twisted hoop while the other has crystals. I have double piercings and one of each style look quite nice together. The twisted hoop has regular backings while the crystal hoop closes on itself. I'm always a little leery about the type the are hinged, afraid they'll break while I'm trying to put them in. If this happens, I see no reason why the post can't be straightened and used as a typical earring. So far, I've had no issues while wearing them. I will react within 1-2 hours at most, and wore them all day without any itchiness. If you're looking for huge hoops, don't order these. These are a little smaller than a penny, which is a perfect size for me. Currently, the regular price is about $14 but the sets are on sale for about $8. There are 5 different combos to decide between, or at this price, order one of each set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Fashionable earrings at a very good price!
reviews.reviewText: Earrings that look good, without being gaudy - a cool concept. The earrings are very pretty, with a slight shine of gold, without being glitzy. They are costume jewelry, to be worn casually, but they are intricate enough to be interesting. Their size (right around 3/4-inches in diameter) is just right to be worn as single-earrings, or as part of multiple-earrings in each ear. As the picture shows, the two pairs of earrings are quite different from each other, yet both could be worn at the same time without clashing with each other, particularly if a pearl or colored stone earring was put between them. They have the metal backs that my wife prefers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute but sort of flimsy
reviews.reviewText: I Love these small hoops for a simpler look and the one pair that came with these with the diamonds I wore for a week straight! I never felt any pain either. I did notice the back kind of poked me a couple times, but it was barely anything. They just were flimsy like they bent when taking them out and then the post would bend super easily when putting them on and taking off the backs. I like them and two for $12 is a good deal but just know they won't last forever

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really nice price for not 1 but 2 sets of fun earrings, one set plain and the other a bit dressier with the small cubic zirconia accents. Nice size, not too big, but can still be seen. They are easy to put on and take off, don’t pinch or change color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive ears which get easily irritated whenever I wear any non-hypoallergenic jewelry. Sometimes product descriptions state “hypoallergenic” for something that really isn’t, but I was so happy that both pairs turned out to be just as described! I am knocking one star off only because one of the gemstone earrings came bent at a staff which made it impossible to get inside the latch without bending it further.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars attractive and well-constructed
reviews.reviewText: These are nice earrings. "Very pretty!," says my wife. They have some weight to them and are not flimsy. This is costume jewelry done right, i.e., they look like real gold earrings. They come packaged in a nice box that makes them good for gifting. Getting two pairs at this low price is almost shockingly good.
